services.description: 3D Printing or Additive Manufacturing (AM) is defined as the technology that constructs a three-dimensional object from a digital 3D or CAD model by adding material layer by layer.
services.sla:
SERVICE STC – 3D Printing

Printed objects shall meet buyer specifications and agreed delivery timelines.
services.specifications->data_to_be_collected[typ: Minimum 3 days lead time required before service commencement.

services.description: AI Model Development Service includes requirement analysis, data preparation, model training, testing, and deployment of machine learning solutions.
services.sla:
SERVICE STC – AI Model Development

Models must meet accuracy benchmarks defined in bid documents.
services.specifications->data_to_be_collected[typ: Minimum 7 days required for requirement gathering and dataset readiness.

services.description: Cloud Migration Service covers assessment, planning, data migration, application migration, and post-migration validation.
services.sla:
SERVICE STC – Cloud Migration

Zero data loss and adherence to security standards are mandatory.
services.specifications->data_to_be_collected[typ: Buyer must provide infrastructure access and application documentation.

services.description: Manpower Outsourcing Service includes supply of skilled, semi-skilled, and unskilled manpower with statutory compliance.
services.sla:
SERVICE STC – Manpower Outsourcing

Replacement of manpower within 48 hours in case of non-performance.
services.specifications->data_to_be_collected[typ: Minimum 7 working days required for onboarding manpower resources.

services.description: Housekeeping Service includes daily cleaning, sanitation, waste disposal, and periodic deep cleaning.
services.sla:
SERVICE STC – Housekeeping

Daily cleaning logs must be maintained and shared with the buyer.
services.specifications->data_to_be_collected[typ: Buyer must provide area layout and cleaning frequency details.

services.description: Taxi Hiring Service provides vehicles with drivers for official travel including fuel and maintenance.
services.sla:
SERVICE STC – Taxi Hiring

Vehicle replacement within 30 minutes in case of breakdown.
services.specifications->data_to_be_collected[typ: Buyer must specify vehicle type, duty hours, and pickup location.
